price: Dájúdájú A fún (Ànábì) Mūsā ní Tírà. A tún ṣe arákùnrin rẹ̀, Hārūn, ní amúgbálẹ́gbẹ̀ẹ́ fún un.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَجَعَلۡنَا مَعَهُۥٓ أَخَاهُ هَٰرُونَ وَزِيرٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā mūsā al-kitāba wajaʿalnā maʿahu akhāhu hārūna wazīran
